frozen_definition.name: PackWise
frozen_definition.signal_source: Travel blog comments: 'hate packing and hate lists so inevitably either forget something or bring too much', 'need to pack like a few weeks before travel or forget stuff'
frozen_definition.description: Smart travel packing assistant that learns from your past trips and suggests personalized packing lists based on destination, weather, and trip type
frozen_definition.target_user: Frequent travelers who stress about packing and consistently forget essential items
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report 'total NIGHTMARE' packing experiences, forgetting important items, and bringing unnecessary extras
frozen_definition.differentiation: Learns from user's actual packing patterns rather than generic templates, focuses on reducing packing anxiety vs. complex travel planning
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium features include unlimited trips, weather integration, collaborative packing for families, and smart notifications

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for 3 trips, then subscription for unlimited trips and premium features
